含义: The character '好' means 'good', 'well', 'nice', or 'to like'. It is used to express positive qualities, approval, or preference.
字形: The character '好' is composed of two parts: '女' (nǚ), meaning 'woman', and '子' (zǐ), meaning 'child'. Together, they symbolize a woman with a child, often interpreted as a harmonious or good relationship.
读音: The pronunciation of '好' is 'hǎo' in the third tone.
字源: The character '好' originated from ancient Chinese pictographs. The combination of '女' and '子' was used to depict a mother and child, representing harmony and goodness.
成语: 好高骛远 (hào gāo wù yuǎn, aim too high)
好事多磨 (hǎo shì duō mó, good things take time)
好自为之 (hǎo zì wéi zhī, take care of yourself)
好逸恶劳 (hào yì wù láo, love ease and hate work)
例句: 你好！今天天气真好。 (Nǐ hǎo! Jīntiān tiānqì zhēn hǎo. - Hello! The weather is really nice today.)
这本书很好看。 (Zhè běn shū hěn hǎokàn. - This book is very good-looking.)
短故事: Once upon a time, there was a kind woman who always helped others. People said she was '好' because she brought happiness to everyone around her.
A child once asked his mother why the character '好' has '女' and '子'. The mother explained that it represents the love and care between a mother and child, which is the foundation of goodness.
诗词: 《静夜思》 - 李白 (Jìng Yè Sī - Lǐ Bái): '床前明月光，疑是地上霜。举头望明月，低头思故乡。' (The bright moonlight before my bed, I suspect it is frost on the ground. I raise my head to gaze at the bright moon, and lower it to think of my hometown.)
《春晓》 - 孟浩然 (Chūn Xiǎo - Mèng Hàorán): '春眠不觉晓，处处闻啼鸟。夜来风雨声，花落知多少。' (Spring sleep, unaware of dawn, everywhere I hear birds singing. Last night's wind and rain, how many flowers have fallen?)
